title: Preview Worker: Implement Worker Skeleton & Job Model
body:
## Description
Implement a background worker process that accepts preview jobs and processes them.

## Priority
P0

## Estimated Effort
6-10 hours

## Acceptance Criteria
- A new worker process (src/worker/previewWorker.js) listens to "preview" queue and processes jobs.
- Worker picks up a test job (local dev mode) and writes an empty placeholder artifact to DATA_DIR/previews/test-job-{jobId}/preview.json.
- Worker registers metrics preview_worker_jobs_total and preview_worker_job_duration_seconds.
- Start script: npm run worker:preview documented in README.

## Implementation Notes
- Use BullMQ if REDIS_URL available. If not, enable DEV_JOB_STORE=sqlite fallback using SQLite table jobs.
- Job payload schema: { jobId, projectId, previewRequest: { chapterId, steps[], env: {...} }, dryRun: boolean, requestId }.

## Labels
feature, phase-g, preview-worker, backend
## Assignee
developer
